name: PERSOLKELLY Consulting
description: PERSOLKELLY Consulting, a leading global HR consulting and professional services firm, spans the Asia-Pacific region. Formed through the joint venture of PERSOL Group and Kelly Services Inc., it's a top recruitment company in APAC. Formerly BTI Consultants and Intelligence SMC, it specializes in talent development, HR advisory, and organizational effectiveness. Committed to innovation, PERSOLKELLY Consulting empowers individuals and enterprises, shaping a future workforce focused on productivity and positivity.
